name: IMMORTAL MAN
description:
Deflect alien attacks (literally) and save the lives of helpless citizens playing as a glorious hero, the invincible Immortal Man!

Controls via keyboard or controller!

WASD/Left Stick - move
Space/Y - pick up citizens and drop them in the bunker
ALT+F4 - exit

@alexhonor - gamedesign, programming
@renrok - art, animation
